<script>
    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!customElements.get('jky-diy-media')) {
            customElements.define('jky-diy-media', class JkyDiyMedia extends HTMLElement {
                constructor() {
                    super();
                    this.DOM = this.querySelector(".diy-media-swiper .swiper-container")
                    if (this.DOM) {
                        this.isMobile = window.innerWidth < 1024;
                        this.init()
                        $(this).find(".jky-tabs-item").first().addClass('curr_tab')
                    }
                }

                init() {
                    const that = this
                    this.diyMediaSwiper = new Swiper(this.DOM, {
                        // initialSlide: 0,
                        centeredSlides: true,
                        observer: false,
                        observeParents: true,
                        allowTouchMove: false,
                        navigation: {
                            nextEl: this.querySelector(".diy-media-swiper-navigation .swiper-btn-next"),
                            prevEl: this.querySelector(".diy-media-swiper-navigation .swiper-btn-prev")
                        },
                        speed: 800,
                        on: {
                            init: function() {
                                const this_swiper = this
                                $(that).find(".slide-contents .slide-content").eq(0).addClass("active")
                                    that.playSlidesVideo()
                                    $(that).find("jky-tabs .jky-tabs-item").click(function(e) {
                                        this_swiper.slideTo($(this).index())
                                        const jkytab = $(that).find("jky-tabs")[0]
                                        jkytab.slideToVisiable($(this)[0])
                                        $(this).siblings().removeClass("active");
                                        $(this).addClass("active");
                                        that.setTabsUnderline_t()
                                        $(that).find(".slide-contents .slide-content").removeClass("active")
                                        $(that).find(".slide-contents .slide-content").eq($(this).index()).addClass("active")
                                    })
                            },
                            slideChangeTransitionStart: function() {
                                that.pasueSlidesVideo()
                                $(that).find("jky-tabs .jky-tabs-item").removeClass('active')
                                $(that).find("jky-tabs .jky-tabs-item").eq(this.activeIndex).addClass("active")
                                that.setTabsUnderline_t()
                                $(that).find(".slide-contents .slide-content").removeClass("active")
                                $(that).find(".slide-contents .slide-content").eq(this.activeIndex).addClass("active")
                            },
                            slideChangeTransitionEnd: function() {
                                that.playSlidesVideo()
                            }
                        }
                    })

                     that.setTabsUnderline_t()
                }

                setTabsUnderline_t() {
                    const tabs_under = $(this).find("jky-tabs .jky-tabs-slideline--inner")
                    const active_tab = $(this).find("jky-tabs .jky-tabs-item.active")
                    if (!tabs_under.length || !active_tab.length) return
                    tabs_under.width(`${active_tab.width()}px`)
                    tabs_under.css("left", `${active_tab.position().left}px`)
                }

                playSlidesVideo() { // 播放slide中的视频
                    const activeSlide = $(this).find(".diy-media-swiper-container .swiper-slide-active")
                    const clas = this.isMobile ? '.jky-video--mb': '.jky-video--pc'
                    const video = $(activeSlide).find(`jky-video${clas}`)
                    if(video && video.length > 0) {
                        const play = function () {
                            try {
                                video[0].jsPlay(false)
                            } catch (error) {
                                setTimeout(() => {
                                    video[0].jsPlay(false)
                                }, 1000)
                            }
                        }
                        play()
                    }
                }
                pasueSlidesVideo() {
                    for(let i = 0; i < $(this).find("jky-video").length; i++) {
                        const curr = $(this).find("jky-video")[i]
                        if(!curr || $(curr).parent("swiper-slider").hasClass("swiper-slide-active")) {

                        } else {
                            curr.pause && curr.pause()
                        }

                    }
                }
            })
        }
    })
</script>

<script>
    $('.activity-des a').on('click', function(event) {
        window.dataLayer.push({ "event_parameters": null });
        window.dataLayer.push({
            "event":"ga4Event",
            "event_name": "activity_page_user_clicks",
            "event_parameters":{
                "current_page": window.location.href, // current page url
                "module": "Text Display",
                "button_name": $(this).text(),
                "link": $(this).attr('href')
            }
        });
    });

    $(document).ready(function () {
        let consecutiveEmptyCount = 0; // 记录连续空 p 标签的数量
  
        $('.activity-des p').each(function () {
          // 检查当前 <p> 是否为空
          if ($(this).text().trim() === '') {
            consecutiveEmptyCount++; // 增加连续计数器
            if (consecutiveEmptyCount >= 2) {
              $(this).addClass('extra-empty'); // 从第二个空标签开始添加特殊样式
            }
          } else {
            consecutiveEmptyCount = 0; // 遇到非空标签时重置计数器
          }
        });
      });
</script>

A representative from our partnered installation company will reach out to discuss logistics and service coverage in your area. An assigned electrician will collaborate with you on scheduling, on-site surveys, installation details, and costs. If you have any questions or concerns about your installation, you can always contact Jackery via email at hello@jackery.com or by phone at 888.502.2236. </p><p></p><p><br/><br/>Installation service is limited to designated areas. <a href="https://www.jackery.com/pages/smart-transfer-switch-installation-service#gPfzyji9pt" target="_blank" title="https://www.jackery.com/pages/smart-transfer-switch-installation-service#gPfzyji9pt"><strong>See T&C for details.</strong></a></p>

            <p>Any certified electrician should be able to install the Jackery Smart Transfer Switch (STS). Self-Sourcing Qualified Electricians for Installation<br/>B.  Recommendation of SupTech </p><p><br/><strong>SupTech contact information is as follows:</strong><br/>Email: installation@suptech.global<br/>Call: 213-457-3409 or 323-412-5103<br/><br/><br/>Once you receive your Jackery 5000 Plus and the STS, if you are unable to find an electrician to install it, please fill out the provided <a href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ZIFnrwCOq6X9QsRPvP_VyLhHgLE5IyzM4wMMFVOgBD8/viewform?edit_requested=true#settings" target="_blank" title="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ZIFnrwCOq6X9QsRPvP_VyLhHgLE5IyzM4wMMFVOgBD8/viewform?edit_requested=true#settings"><strong>questionnaire</strong></a> and contact either SupTech to initiate the installation process. .common-button-wrap {
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}
.common-button-wrap .index-button {
  --index-button-p: 10px 0 10px 32px;
  --index-button-hover-p: 7px 7px 7px 16px;
  --index-button-r: 28px;
  --index-button-text: 18px;
  --index-button-h: 48px;
  --index-arrow-w: 0;
  --index-arrow-h: 0;
  --index-arrow-r: 28px;
  --index-arrow-ml: 9px;
  --index-arrow-svg-w: 14px;
  --index-arrow-hover-w: 32px;
  --index-arrow-hover-h: 32px;

  padding: var(--index-button-p);
  border-radius: var(--index-button-r);
  font-size: var(--index-button-text);
  color: #FFFFFF;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  background: var(--primary-color);
  height: var(--index-button-h);
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.8, 0, 0.2, 1);
}
.common-button-wrap .index-button > div {
  overflow: hidden;
}
.common-button-wrap .index-button .arrow {
  width: var(--index-arrow-hover-w);
  height: var(--index-arrow-hover-h);
  border-radius: var(--index-arrow-r);
  background: rgba(253, 115, 51, 1);
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.8, 0, 0.2, 1);
  display: flex;
  transform: scale(0);
}
.common-button-wrap .index-button svg {
  transform: translateX(calc(0px - var(--index-arrow-svg-w)));
  width: var(--index-arrow-svg-w);
  transition: all 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.8, 0, 0.2, 1);
}


.common-button-wrap .index-button:hover {
  padding: var(--index-button-hover-p);
}
.common-button-wrap .index-button:hover .common-button-wrap .index-button > div {
  overflow: inherit;
}
.common-button-wrap .index-button:hover .arrow {
  margin-left: var(--index-arrow-ml);
  transform: scale(1);
}
.common-button-wrap .index-button:hover svg {

<script>
    $('.activity-des a').on('click', function(event) {
        window.dataLayer.push({ "event_parameters": null });
        window.dataLayer.push({
            "event":"ga4Event",
            "event_name": "activity_page_user_clicks",
            "event_parameters":{
                "current_page": window.location.href, // current page url
                "module": "Text Display",
                "button_name": $(this).text(),
                "link": $(this).attr('href')
            }
        });
    });

    $(document).ready(function () {
        let consecutiveEmptyCount = 0; // 记录连续空 p 标签的数量
  
        $('.activity-des p').each(function () {
          // 检查当前 <p> 是否为空
          if ($(this).text().trim() === '') {
            consecutiveEmptyCount++; // 增加连续计数器
            if (consecutiveEmptyCount >= 2) {
              $(this).addClass('extra-empty'); // 从第二个空标签开始添加特殊样式
            }
          } else {
            consecutiveEmptyCount = 0; // 遇到非空标签时重置计数器
          }
        });
      });
</script>

<ul data-index="0" class="active">
                            
<li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Can the E5000 Plus be used in parallel with the E2000 Plus, E1000 Plus, or their additional power packs simultaneously?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>No, they are distinct products with varying voltage, current, and power specifications, rendering them incompatible for simultaneous parallel use.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Does the E5000 Plus support compatibility and connection with the E2000 Plus and similar models?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>The E5000 Plus and E2000 Plus can charge each other by connecting each unit's AC input to the other’s AC output.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Can the E5000 Plus be used in parallel with other Jackery products that support parallel usage? Can products from other brands be used in parallel with Jackery products?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>The E5000 Plus supports parallel usage of two E5000Plus units via STS. It does not support parallel usage with other Jackery power station products or with products from other brands.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>How would I integrate the E5000 Plus into my existing system? Can the E5000 Plus be connected to our home circuit system and work as UPS?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Yes, E5000 Plus supports connecting to your home circuit system and you can insert it into by TS/Inlet box/STS.If the E5000 Plus is solely connected to home circuits and the Online UPS mode is selected in the APP, it will immediately power on upon detecting a power outage. If the E5000 Plus is connected to the Jackery Smart Transfer Switch, the response time in the event of a power failure will be 20 milliseconds due to the Transfer Switch's capabilities.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Is the E5000 Plus expandable? How to increase the capacity of the E5000 Plus？</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>The Jackery E5000 Plus is expandable, offering an initial 5kWh. Connecting one 5000 Plus unit with a E5000 Plus Battery Pack provides 10kWh, expandable up to 5 Battery Packs for a total of 30kWh. With two E5000 Plus units and 10 Battery Packs, you can reach a maximum of 60kWh. Please look up the maximum capacity allowed in your jurisdiction prior to ordering.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Is the exterior material fireproof? What is the fire-proof level?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>It uses the highest 94V-0 fireproof material required by American UL</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Why can't the 5000 Plus charge via AC input?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>When connected to the STS, the 120V AC input cannot be used to charge the E5000 Plus.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>How long can the 5000 Plus power common household appliances?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>The runtime of the Jackery 5000 Plus depends on the power consumption of the appliances being used.</p><p>For example, a 170L household refrigerator (15–520W) can run for approximately 8 hours in freezing mode and up to 110 hours in insulation mode. A compact refrigerator (90W) can operate for about 26 hours. </p><p>A central air conditioner (2200–3050W) can run for around 2 hours in cooling mode and 1.7 hours in heating mode, while a wall-mounted AC unit (900W) can run for about 4.5 hours.<br />
<br />
These figures are based on Jackery lab tests and may vary depending on the actual power draw of the appliances and environmental conditions. The data is for reference only.<br />
</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Can the 5000 Plus be connected to third-party solar panels, generators, or fuel-powered devices?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Yes, the Jackery 5000 Plus can be connected to third-party solar panels or fuel-powered generators, provided they meet the required input interface and connection standards. For safe and efficient operation, please ensure the voltage, current, and connector type are compatible with the Jackery 5000 Plus. Detailed input specifications can be found in the product’s technical parameters.<br />
<br />
While third-party access is possible, Jackery recommends using official accessories to ensure optimal performance and maintain warranty coverage.<br />
<br />
</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>How many functional modes does the Jackery 5000 Plus have?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>The Jackery 5000 Plus features five functional modes to improve user convenience and battery performance:</p><p><br />
1. Quiet Charging Mode – This mode reduces charging power and slows down the charging speed to significantly lower noise levels. It can be enabled or disabled in the Jackery App.</p><p><br />
2. Battery Saving Mode – When activated, this mode limits the available battery capacity to extend the lifespan of the battery cells. It can also be managed through the Jackery App.</p><p><br />
3. Energy Saving Mode – Enabled by default, this mode prevents unnecessary battery drain by automatically turning off all outputs after 12 hours when no device is connected or if the connected load is minimal (AC Output ≤ 25W, USB Output ≤ 2W, Car Output ≤ 2W).</p><p><br />
4. UPS Mode- Connect the product to a wall outlet with the AC charging cable, then press the AC output button and power your appliances at the same time . The backup UPS function is enabled by default. In the event of a sudden loss of mains power, the device will automatically power up your appliances with the stored power within 20 ms.<br />
 Please note：① The NEMA L14-30R and NEMA 14-50 outputs cannot be used in Bypass mode when the product is connected to a wall outlet with the AC charging cable.② The system settings will return to backup UPS mode once the product restarts in online UPS mode</p><p><br />
5. Charging Mode - supports 4 major charging methods: ① Charging via AC Wall Outlet ② Charging via Smart Transfer Switch ③ Charging via Solar Panels ④Charging via Car Charger. Please note: Fully charge the device before its first use.<br />
<br />
</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li></ul><ul data-index="1" class="">
                            
<li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>How much does it cost for installation of the Smart Transfer Switch?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>The cost is typically 1500-2000 USD, but it may vary depending on your location and specific home conditions. For details, you can discuss with our certified installer after placing an order or consult a local electrician.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Does the Smart Transfer Switch accomodate more than one E5000 Plus?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Yes, the Jackery Smart Transfer Switch supports connecting two Explorer 5000 Plus units in parallel, allowing for increased power capacity and redundancy in your home power system.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Why doesn't the E5000 Plus start charging immediately after connecting to the Smart Transfer Switch?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>By default, the Smart Transfer Switch automatically charges the E5000 Plus only when its battery level drops below a preset value. To charge immediately, please use the app: App > Smart Transfer Switch > Power Station > Charge now. To change the default preset value, use the app: App > Smart Transfer Switch > Working Modes > Set Backup Reserve.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Why do some circuits not have power after the mains power is restored?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>After the mains power is restored, the circuits that were disconnected based on backup power priority during the outage will not be automatically turned on to reduce the risk of electric shock. Customers need to manually turn on the disconnected circuits.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li></ul><ul data-index="2" class="">
                            
<li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Can the E5000 Plus Battery Pack charge my device separately?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>No, the Battery Pack need to be connected to the E5000 Plus power station for charging.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li></ul><ul data-index="3" class="">
                            
<li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Is E5000 Plus compatible with all the Jackery Solar Panels?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>The charging port of the E5000 Plus has dimensions of 8020, making it compatible with all the solar panels we currently have on sale. If you have older versions of solar panels with capacities of 60W/100W/200W, you will need to use a 7909-to-8082 adapter.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li><li>
                                <div class="faq-header flex">
                                  <span>Can the Jackery Explorer 5000 Plus be used with outdoor solar panels while the main unit stays indoors? Are extended cables available, and is there a recommended length limit?</span>
                                  <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                                </div>
                                <div class="faq-content">
                                  <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Yes, you can extend the connection indefinitely by purchasing the Jackery 5M DC extension cable, though longer connections may reduce solar charging efficiency.</p></div></div>
                                  <div></div>
                                </div>
                              </li></ul></div>

<product-faq  class="produc-detail--contetn_item bg-deep" data-isunfold="true">
                  <div class="produc-detail--faq section-container product-block-section" >
                      <!-- faq -->
                      <div class="faq-title">Installation FAQs</div>
                      <ul><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>Who is eligible to install the Jackery Smart Transfer Switch (STS)?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">Any certified electrician should be able to install the STS.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>Can I use my own electrician or by myself?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">Yes, you may use your own certified electrician, or handle the STS installation yourself (if you are certified), at your own expense. We highly recommend contacting Jackery for training and certification before proceeding with the installation. You can also refer to the STS User Guide, FAQs, and installation videos available on our website.  </div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>Does Jackery provide installation services for the STS?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">Jackery does not install the STS but we’ve partnered with third-party companies to provide installation services for U.S. customers in over 40 states.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>Who should I contact for my installation—Jackery or a third-party company?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">If you choose to use Jackery’s resource for your installation, please fill out the online STS Installation Request Form or contact our Customer Service at hello@jackery.com or 888.502.2236.  STS Installation Request Form link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ZIFnrwCOq6X9QsRPvP_VyLhHgLE5IyzM4wMMFVOgBD8/viewform?edit_requested=true</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>What information do I need for my installation?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">Jackery or a third-party company will send you a STS Installation Request Form to begin the installation process. You should prepare your order information, contact information including your email, phone number and address for the installation.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>I’ve completed the STS Installation Request Form and contacted the installation company but haven’t received a response. What should I do?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">Ensure that the email and phone number you provided are correct. Also, check your Spam folder. If you still don’t receive a response, contact the installation company or Jackery again. A representative will reach out to you.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>The installation company scheduled an electrician for me, but I haven’t heard from them. What should I do?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">Check your Spam folder first. If there’s still no response, contact the installation company or Jackery again for assistance.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>What if the electrician is unable to provide service on time or cannot be contacted?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">The customer should contact Jackery or the installation company, who will assist in reaching the electrician or assign a new one.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>What checks/inspections are performed before installation?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">The assigned electrician will perform a pre-installation inspection and conduct an on-site assessment to evaluate the installation area and determine the necessary materials. If an on-site visit is not feasible, a virtual inspection can be arranged.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>How will I be notified of the installation quote?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">After completing the inspection, the electrician will prepare an installation quote and send it to the customer for confirmation. Installation will proceed only after the customer agrees to the quote.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>What should I do if I have concerns or I'm dissatisfied with the quote?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">The customer can discuss the details of the quote with the electrician or the installation company to seek reasonable adjustments.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>How is faulty or defective STS handled before, during or after the installation?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">The customer should contact Jackery customer service to arrange a return or replacement. Jackery will handle the return of the defective product and arrange for a replacement to be shipped to the customer’s home.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>What should be done if issues arise during the installation?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">If any issues occur during the installation process, the electrician should promptly contact Jackery’s technical support team for assistance.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span> What should the electrician do if the on-site conditions differ from expectations?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">The electrician should immediately contact both the customer and the installation company to discuss solutions and adjust the installation plan accordingly.</div>
                              </li><li>
                                  <div class="faq-header flex">
                                      <span>Where Can I Find More Information About Installing the Jackery Smart Transfer Switch (STS)?</span>
                                      <div class="toggle_btn"></div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div class="faq-content rte">If you need detailed guidance on installing the Jackery Smart Transfer Switch (STS), please visit installation service page at: https://www.jackery.com/pages/smart-transfer-switch-installation-service.  This page provides service options, and additional support to ensure a smooth setup process.</div>
                              </li></ul>

                      </div>
              </product-faq>

Please with the product</p></div> <div class='jdgm-rev__pics'>  </div> <div class='jdgm-rev__vids'>   </div> <div class='jdgm-rev__transparency-badge-wrapper'>  </div> </div> <div class='jdgm-rev__actions'> <div class='jdgm-rev__social'></div> <div class='jdgm-rev__votes'></div> </div> <div class='jdgm-rev__reply'>  </div> </div><div class='jdgm-rev jdgm-divider-top' data-verified-buyer='true' data-review-id='ed43f4a7-bc51-4538-b64d-411c07511e66' data-review-language='' data-product-title='Jackery Explorer 5000 Plus' data-product-url='https://www.jackery.com/products/jackery-explorer-5000-plus' data-thumb-up-count='0' data-thumb-down-count='0'> <div class='jdgm-rev__header'>  <div class='jdgm-rev__icon' > S </div>  <span class='jdgm-rev__rating' data-score='5' tabindex='0' aria-label='5 star review' role='img'> <span class='jdgm-star jdgm--on'></span><span class='jdgm-star jdgm--on'></span><span class='jdgm-star jdgm--on'></span><span class='jdgm-star jdgm--on'></span><span class='jdgm-star jdgm--on'></span> </span> <span class='jdgm-rev__timestamp jdgm-spinner' data-content='2025-08-09 14:55:29 UTC'></span>  <div class='jdgm-rev__br'></div> <span class='jdgm-rev__buyer-badge-wrapper'> <span class='jdgm-rev__buyer-badge'></span> </span> <span class='jdgm-rev__author-wrapper'> <span class='jdgm-rev__author'>Steve Hazin</span> <span class='jdgm-rev__location' >  </span>  </span> </div> <div class='jdgm-rev__content'>  <div class='jdgm-rev__custom-form'>  </div> <b class='jdgm-rev__title'>Mixed Feelings</b> <div class='jdgm-rev__body'><p>So the Jackery 5000 is a great product. I think the way it’s marketed or described is a teeny bit misleading. It does not work like a regular generator. It had a super conservative power management system that designs it not to kill itself.  The 2 things that bother me the most about it. </p>

<p>1. In the morning when the Jackery starts charging from the solar panels. AC output shuts off, so you have to do a series of resets and unplugging to get it to turn back on. Or you can just wait a few hours. Still need to the reset though. </p>

<p>2. There is no pass through charging when connected to a gas generator. Only thing I haven’t tried to try and accomplish this is disconnect the solar panels. Something there support team recommended. </p>

<p>Customer support is very thorough and they try to help, even though they have limitations. </p>

<p>I am still going to give it 5 stars because I do not think it was intended to run a whole house off grid, which I am trying to do. <script defer>
    /* 图文轮播版块 */
    if(window.innerWidth < 1024 && document.querySelector(".media_highlight_text_swiper")) {
        new Swiper(".media_highlight_text_swiper .swiper", {
            pagination: {
                el: ".media_highlight_text_swiper .swiper-pagination",
                type: "progressbar",
            },
            slidesPerView: "auto"
        })
    }
    /* 图文轮播版块 */
    if (document.querySelector(".media_highlight_animate")) {
        class ProdcutDetailVideo {
            constructor({ el }) {
                this.DOM = document.querySelector(el)
                this.el = el

                // 当前播放视频的索引
                this.curIndex = 0

                if (this.DOM) {
                    this.jkyVideos = this.DOM.querySelectorAll('jky-video')

                    // 是否都配置的 mp4 格式的视频
                    const mp4Video = Array.from(this.jkyVideos).filter(item => item.getAttribute('video-type') === 'mp4')
                    this.isAllMp4 = mp4Video.length === this.jkyVideos.length

                    // 修正 this 指向，方便新增和移除事件
                    this.videoEndedPlayEvent = this.videoEndedPlayEvent.bind(this)

                    this.init()
                    this.observe()
                }
            }
            init() {
                this.jkyVideos.forEach((item, index) => {
                    const posterWrap = item.querySelector('.jky-video-poster_container')
                    posterWrap.onclick = () => {
                        this.curIndex = index

                        // 暂停全部
                        this.jkyVideos.forEach(it => {
                            if (it && it.pause) {
                                it.videoInfo.autoplay = false
                                it.pause()
                            }
                        })

                        // 播放当前
                        this.playVideo(item)
                    }
                })
            }
            playVideo(curVideo) {
                if (curVideo && curVideo.loadContent) {
                    curVideo.videoInfo.autoplay = true
                    curVideo.loadContent(false)

                    if (this.isAllMp4) {
                        // 监听视频播放完成事件
                        curVideo.querySelector('video').addEventListener('ended', this.videoEndedPlayEvent)
                    }
                }
            }
            // 视频播放完成事件
            videoEndedPlayEvent() {
                this.curIndex++
                this.playVideo(this.jkyVideos[this.curIndex])
            }
            observe() {
                // 视频进入视口监听播放
                const Observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries, observer) => {
                    entries.forEach(entry => {
                        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                            if (this.curIndex !== this.jkyVideos.length - 1) {
                                // 播放视频
                                const curVideo = this.jkyVideos[this.curIndex]
                                this.playVideo(curVideo)
                            }
                        } else {
                            // 暂停播放
                            const curVideo = this.jkyVideos[this.curIndex]
                            if (curVideo && curVideo.pause) {
                                curVideo.videoInfo.autoplay = false
                                curVideo.pause()

                                if (this.isAllMp4) {
                                    // 移除当前视频播放完成事件
                                    curVideo.querySelector('video')?.removeEventListener('ended', this.videoEndedPlayEvent)
                                }

                            }
                        }
                    })
                },{
                    root: null,
                    rootMargin: '0px',
                    threshold: 0.25, // 设置阈值为80%，即视频可见面积超过50%触发播放
                })

                Observer.observe(this.DOM)
            }
        }
    }
    if (!customElements.get('product-specs')) {
        customElements.define('product-specs', class ProductSpecs extends HTMLElement {
            constructor() {
                super()
                this.selectors = {
                    accordion_header: $(this).find(".accordion-ul .accordion-header"),
                    swiper_dom: $(this).find('.user-guide-swiper')[0],
                    swiper_num: $(this).find(".user-guide-swiper .swiper-slide").length,
                    specs_dom: $(this).find(".accordion-content--with-child.specs"),
                    manual: $(this).find(".manual-list")
                }
                this.init()
                this?.getSpecsInfo()
                this?.getUserManual()
            }

            init() {
                this.specVariant()
                // accordion toggle
                this.selectors.accordion_header.click(function () {
                    // 
                    $(this).next('.accordion-content').slideToggle()
                    $(this).find(".accordion-close").toggleClass("active")
                })

                // video pics swiper
                if (this.selectors.swiper_num) {
                    let that = this
                    this.swiper = new Swiper(this.selectors.swiper_dom, {
                        slidesPerView: 'auto',
                        spaceBetween: 0,
                        centeredSlides: true,
                        followFinger: false,
                        pagination: {
                            el: this.selectors.swiper_dom.querySelector(".slideshow-pagination"),
                            clickable: true,
                            bulletClass: 'slideshow-pagination-item',
                            bulletActiveClass: 'active pagination-active',
                            clickableClass: 'slideshow-pagination-clickable',
                            modifierClass: 'slideshow-pagination-',
                            renderBullet: function (index, className) {
                                var slideIndex = index,
                                    number = (index <= 8) ? '0' + (slideIndex + 1) : (slideIndex + 1);

                                var paginationItem = '<span class="slideshow-pagination-item">';
                                paginationItem = (index <= 8) ? paginationItem +
                                    '<span class="pagination-separator"><span class="pagination-separator-loader"></span></span>' :
                                    paginationItem;
                                paginationItem += '</span>';
                                return paginationItem;
                            }
                        },
                        on: {
                            resize: function () {
                                setTimeout(() => {
                                    that.swiper.update()
                                }, 600);
                            },
                            slideChange: function () {
                                var activeIndex = this.activeIndex;
                                this.slides.each(function (slide, index) {
                                    if (index !== activeIndex) {
                                        var video = $(slide).find('jky-video')[0];
                                        if (video && video.pause) {
                                            video.pause();
                                        }
                                    } else {
                                        var video = $(slide).find('jky-video')[0];
                                        if (video && video.loadContent) {
                                            video.loadContent()
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            }
                        }
                    })
                }
            }

            specVariant(init = true) { // 加点包
                $(".accordion-header--variant:not(.active)").next('.accordion-content').slideUp(0)
                $(".accordion-header--variant:not(.active)").find(".accordion-close").removeClass("active")

                if(!init) {
                    $(".accordion-header--variant.active").next('.accordion-content').slideDown(0)
                    $(".accordion-header--variant.active").find(".accordion-close").addClass("active")
                }
            }

            creatSpecsItemDom(obj) {
                let html = ''
                for (let n in obj) {
                    if (typeof(obj[n]) === 'string') {
                        html += `
                <div class="specs-item">
                    <span class="key">${n}${obj[n]? ':' : ''}</span>
                    <span class="value">${this.replaceLineBreak(obj[n])}</span>
                </div>
                `
                    } else {
                        html += this.creatSpecsItemDom(obj[n])
                    }
                }
                return html
            }

            replaceLineBreak(str){
                if (str.includes('\n')) {
                  return str.replace(/\n/g, '<br>');
                }
                return str
            }

            creatSpecsDom(data = []) {
                let box = '';
                data.map(item => {
                    if (item.baseInfos) {
                        // 过滤特殊逻辑
						Object.keys(item.baseInfos).forEach(key => {
							if (['Price', 'In The Box', 'Solar Charging Time'].includes(key)) {
								delete item.baseInfos[key]
							}
						})

                        let row = '';
                        for (let i in item.baseInfos) {
                            let col = '';
                            if (item.baseInfos[i]) {
                                let obj = item.baseInfos[i]
                                if (typeof(obj) === 'string') {
                                    col += `
                            <div class="specs-item">
                                <span class="key">${obj}</span>
                            </div>
                            `
                                } else {
                                    col += this.creatSpecsItemDom(obj)
                                }
                            }
                            row += `
                            <div class="specs-row">
                                <div class="title">${i}</div>
                                <div class="specs-wrap">
                                    ${col}
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        `
                        }
                        box += `
                        <div class="accordion-ul">
                            <div class="accordion-header">
                                <h3 class="jky-text-lg font-bold">${item.title}</h3>
                                <img class="accordion-close active"
                                src="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0550/0524/9633/files/icon_4.svg?v=1678936033"
                                alt="accordion-icon" loading="lazy" width="28" height="28">
                            </div>

                            <div class="accordion-content">
                                <div class="item-box-content">${row}</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    `
                    }
                })
                return box
            }

            // 产品参数获取
            getSpecsInfo(skuId) {
                var sku_id = skuId
                if(!skuId) {
                    sku_id = document.querySelector("product-form")?.querySelector('[name=id]')?.value
                }

                fetch(`${pageInfo.api}/osconsumerapi/app-product-comparison/consumer/detail?shopifyShopId=${pageInfo.shopId}&skuId=${sku_id}`)
                    .then((response) => response.json())
                    .then(res => {
                        let data = res.data;
                        let dom = this.creatSpecsDom(data)
                        if (data && Array.isArray(data) && data.length) {
							              document.querySelector(".accordion--product-specs") && document.querySelector(".accordion--product-specs").classList.remove("hidden")
                            this.selectors.specs_dom.html(dom)
                            this.selectors.specs_dom.find(".accordion-header").click(function () {
                                $(this).next('.accordion-content').slideToggle()
                                $(this).find(".accordion-close").toggleClass("active")
                            })
                        } else {
                            this.selectors.specs_dom.find('.accordion-ul').empty()
                            document.querySelector(".accordion--product-specs") && document.querySelector(".accordion--product-specs").classList.add("hidden")
                        }
                    })
                    .catch(e => {
                        console.error("Fetch error: getSpecsInfo", e)
                    })
            }

            // 说明书
            getUserManual(sku) {
                var sku_id = sku
                if(!sku) {
                    sku_id = document.querySelector("product-form").querySelector('[name=id]').getAttribute("data-sku")
                }
                this.selectors.manual.find("dd:not(.not-manual)").remove();

                // 如果shopify元字段有配置，则取shopify的，没有则取接口
                const _currentVariant = window.product.productVariants[document.querySelector("product-form").querySelector('[name=id]').getAttribute("value")]
                const batteryInfos = _currentVariant.batteryInfos || []
                if (batteryInfos.length > 0) {
                    document.querySelector(".accordion--manual") && document.querySelector(".accordion--manual").classList.remove("hidden")

                    let dd = '';
                    batteryInfos.forEach(item => {
                        dd += `
                    <dd>
                        <p class="jky-text-sm font-500"><i class="iconfont jackery-icon-pdf"></i>${item.title}</p>
                        <a href="${item.url}" target="_blank" class="z-button-fill-middle"><i class="iconfont jackery-icon-download"></i> <span>${window.pageInfo.strings.product.download}</span></a>
                    </dd>
                    `;
                    })
                    this.selectors.manual.prepend(dd)
                    return false
                } else {
                  document.querySelector(".accordion--manual") && document.querySelector(".accordion--manual").classList.add("hidden")
                }

                // 判断是套装还是单品, 套装查询getPackagedInfo, 单品查询getGoodsInfo
                if(this.selectors.manual.attr("type") === 'sg_gather') {
                    fetch(`${pageInfo.api}/osconsumerapi/v1/goods/packaged-info?shopify_shop_id=${pageInfo.shopId}&sku=${sku_id}`)
                        .then((response) => response.json())
                        .then(res => {
                            let dd = '';
                            res.data.filter((item) => !!item.introduceBookUrlDesc).forEach((item) => {
                                dd += `
                        <dd>
                            <p class="jky-text-sm font-500"><i class="iconfont jackery-icon-pdf"></i>${item.title}</p>
                            <a href="${item.introduceBookUrlDesc}" target="_blank" download class="z-button-fill-middle"><i class="iconfont jackery-icon-download"></i> <span>${window.pageInfo.strings.product.download}</span></a>
                        </dd>
                        `;
                            });

                            this.selectors.manual.prepend(dd)
                            if(document.querySelector(".accordion--manual")) {
                              document.querySelectorAll(".accordion--manual dl dd").length > 0 && document.querySelector(".accordion--manual").classList.remove("hidden")
                            }
                        })
                } else {
                    fetch(`${pageInfo.api}/osconsumerapi/v1/goods/info?shopify_shop_id=${pageInfo.shopId}&sku=${sku_id}`)
                        .then((response) => response.json())
                        .then(r => {
                            if (r.data && r.data.introduceBookUrlDesc) {
                                const d_html = `
                            <dd>
                            <p class="jky-text-sm font-500"><i class="iconfont jackery-icon-pdf"></i>${r.data.title}</p>
                            <a href="${r.data.introduceBookUrlDesc}" target="_blank" class="z-button-fill-middle"><i class="iconfont jackery-icon-download"></i> <span>${window.pageInfo.strings.product.download}</span></a>
                            </dd>
                        `;
                                this.selectors.manual.prepend(d_html);
                                if(document.querySelector(".accordion--manual")) {
                                  document.querySelectorAll(".accordion--manual dl dd").length > 0 && document.querySelector(".accordion--manual").classList.remove("hidden")
                                }
                            }
                        })
                }
            }
        })
    }

    if (!customElements.get('product-faq')) {
        customElements.define('product-faq', class ProductFaq extends HTMLElement {
            constructor() {
                super()
                this.selectors = {
                    faq_header: $(this).find(".produc-detail--faq li .faq-header"),
                    faq_num: $(this).find(".produc-detail--faq li").length,
                    more_btn: $(this).find(".faq--more")
                }
                this.init()
            }

            init() {

                $(this).find(".produc-detail--faq ul li:gt(2)").hide()
                let isunfold =  $(this).data('isunfold');
                if (isunfold) {
                    $(this).find(".produc-detail--faq ul li:gt(2)").show()
                }

                this.selectors.faq_header.click(function () {
                    $(this).next('.faq-content').slideToggle()
                    $(this).toggleClass("active")
                })

                this.selectors.more_btn.click(function() {
                    const parentFaq = $(this).closest(".produc-detail--faq");
                    const listItems = parentFaq.find("ul li:gt(2)");
                    if($(this).hasClass("active")) {
                        listItems.hide()
                        $(this).text(pageInfo.strings.product.viewMore)
                    } else {
                        listItems.show();
                        $(this).text(pageInfo.strings.product.viewLess)
                    }
                    $(this).toggleClass("active")
                })
            }
        })
    }

    if(document.querySelector(".media_highlight_plugs")){
        function renderMediaDom(videoSrc, controls, loop) {
            const type= videoSrc.includes('youtube.com') ? 'youtube' : 'mp4'

            let youtube_id = ''
            let youtube_embed = ''

            if (type === "youtube") {
                if(videoSrc.indexOf("/embed/") !== -1) {
                    youtube_id = videoSrc.replace("https://www.youtube.com/embed/", "");
                } else {
                    youtube_id = videoSrc.replace("https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=", "");
                }
                youtube_embed = `https://www.youtube.com/embed/${youtube_id}`;
            }

            let media_dom = ''
            switch (type) {
                case 'mp4':
                    media_dom = `
                    <video
                        class="jky-video_media"
                        x5-video-player-type="h5-page"
                        webkit-playsinline="playsinline"
                        playsinline="playsinline"
                        autoplay="autoplay"
                        muted="muted"
                        ${controls ? 'controls="controls"' : ''}
                        preload="metadata"
                        ${loop ? 'loop' : ''} "&width=1500"
                    >
                        <source src="${videoSrc}" type="video/mp4">
                    </video>
                `
                    break;
                case 'youtube':
                    media_dom = `
                    <iframe
                        class="jky-video_media jky-media_youtube rounded-24"
                        src="${youtube_embed}?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&${loop ? 'loop=1':''}&playlist=${youtube_id}&mute=1"
                        class="js-youtube global-settings-popup"
                        allow="''; encrypted-media"
                        allowfullscreen=""
                    ></iframe>
                `
                default:
                    break;
            }
            return media_dom
        }
        $('.media_highlight_plugs .button-title').on('click', function() {
            const videoSrc = $(this).data('video');
            const controls = $(this).data('controls');
            const loop = $(this).data('loop');
            const popupHtml = renderMediaDom(videoSrc, controls, loop)
            ZModle.getInstance(popupHtml, {
                id: "header-xvideo",
                class: "header__changeLocal"
            })
        });
    }

    if(document.querySelector(".media_highlight_matrix")){
        let domWidth = document.body.scrollWidth;
        $('.media_highlight_matrix').each(function() {
            const matrixGraphList = $(this).find('.product-detail-matrix-graph .matrix-graph-list');
            if (matrixGraphList.children().length === 0) {
                $(this).remove();
            }
            let pclist =$(this).find('.matrix-graph-content.pc-block .matrix-graph-list')
			let mblist =$(this).find('.matrix-graph-content.mb-block .matrix-graph-list')
			if (domWidth > 1024) {
				if (pclist.children().length === 0){
					$(this).find('.product-detail-matrix-graph').css('margin-bottom', '0');
				}
			} else {
				if (mblist.children().length === 0){
					$(this).find('.product-detail-matrix-graph').css('margin-bottom', '0');
				}
			}
        });
        const lastMediaHighlight = $('.pdp-matrix').last();
		const firstMediaHighlight = $('.pdp-matrix').first();
		const pcTop =$('.pdp-matrix .product-detail-matrix').data('top-pc')
		const pcBottom =$('.pdp-matrix .product-detail-matrix').data('bottom-pc')
		const mbTop =$('.pdp-matrix .product-detail-matrix').data('top-mb')
		const mbBottom =$('.pdp-matrix .product-detail-matrix').data('bottom-mb')
		if (domWidth > 1024) {
			if (pcBottom > 0) {
				lastMediaHighlight.css('margin-bottom', pcBottom + 'px');
			}
			if (pcTop > 0) {
				firstMediaHighlight.css('padding-top', pcTop + 'px');
			}
		} else {
			if (mbBottom > 0) {
				lastMediaHighlight.css('padding-bottom', mbBottom + 'vw');
			}
			if (mbTop > 0) {
				firstMediaHighlight.css('padding-top', mbTop + 'vw');
			}
		}
        $('.section-matrix-graph .product-detail-matrix-graph').each(function() {
            let columnTemplate, items, gridList;
            if (domWidth > 1024) {
                gridList = $(this).find('.pc-block .matrix-graph-list');
                columnTemplate = gridList.attr('data-grid-columns');
                items = $(this).find('.pc-block .matrix-graph-item');
                gridList.css('grid-template-columns', columnTemplate);
                const columnCount = columnTemplate.split(' ').length;
                items.each(function(index) {
                    $(this).css('display', index < columnCount ? 'block' : 'none');
                });
            } else {
                gridList = $(this).find('.mb-block .matrix-graph-list');
                columnTemplate = gridList.attr('data-grid-columns');
                items = $(this).find('.mb-block .matrix-graph-item');
                gridList.css('grid-template-columns', 'repeat(2, 1fr)');
                const columnTemplateNum = Number(columnTemplate);
                if (columnTemplateNum > 1 && columnTemplateNum < 4) {
                    switch (columnTemplateNum) {
                        case 2:
                            items.eq(0).css('grid-column', '1 / 3');
                            break;
                        case 3:
                            items.eq(2).css('grid-column', '1 / 3');
                            break;
                    }
                    items.eq(3).css('display', 'none');
                }
                if(columnTemplateNum == 4){
                    items.css('grid-column', 'span 2')
                    items.eq(2).css('display', 'none');
                }
            }
        });

        $('.media_highlight_matrix').css('visibility', 'visible');
    }

    /* 对比版块 */
    if(document.querySelector(".media_highlight_vs")) {
        var swipereee = new Swiper(".media_highlight_vs .swiper-thumbs", {
            spaceBetween: 0,
            slidesPerView: 'auto',
            slidesPerView: 1,
            freeMode: true,
            watchSlidesProgress: true
        });

        new Swiper(".media_highlight_vs .main-swiper", {
            scrollbar: {
                el: ".media_highlight_vs .swiper-scrollbar",
            },
            spaceBetween: 10,
            navigation: {
                nextEl: ".media_highlight_vs .swiper-button-next",
                prevEl: ".media_highlight_vs .swiper-button-prev",
            },
            pagination: {
                el: ".media_highlight_vs .swiper-pagination",
                clickable: true,
            },
